name: One Room At A Time
description:
NB: If playing in the browser, play fullscreen to stop some camera clipping.

Also post below what campaign goals you got.

Instructions:

Get to the green door, don't get spotted.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Spacebar - Interact

Interact - Kills/Uses Switch

Esc - Quits To Menu / Quits Game
